title: Facebook Marketplace Scraper Input
description: Configure the location and search parameters for scraping Facebook Marketplace listings. The scraper will find listings based on your search criteria and extract detailed information including prices, seller details, and images.

locationQuery.title: Location
locationQuery.description: City, state, or area to search within Facebook Marketplace. Examples: 'Miami, FL', 'New York', 'Los Angeles, CA'

listingQuery.title: Search Query
listingQuery.description: What you're looking for on Facebook Marketplace. Examples: 'mountain bike', 'iPhone', 'furniture', 'car'

numPageResults.title: Number of Pages
numPageResults.description: Number of result pages to scrape. Each page contains approximately 24 listings. Higher values will take longer but provide more results.
